name: Save the Villagers (Skleembof)
description:
The game is very rough around the edges, but it was made completely from scratch. Every single asset and script was made within the allotted time of the game jam. No pre-made assets whatsoever (except for Suzanne of course).


Gameplay:
  • WASD - move
  • Space - Jump/jetpack
  • left click - call villagers to follow you
  • right click + left click - aim and shoot
Objective:

Try to save the villagers by shooting your projectiles into the meteor AOE indicators. This lets the villagers know to avoid the area. When the meteor shower ends, rally all the survivors and jump into the ocean to go back in time. Followers that go back with you learn to avoid the meteors on their own.

WARNING: don't hold down Left CTRL, there was supposed to be a mechanic where spider mobs shoot out of the monkey's mouth, but I forgot to move the monkey into position for the final build, and holding control keeps spawning spiders even if you cant see them

Known issues:

  • The UI is massive and there's a bit of mountain that snuck it's way onto the UI camera
  • Calling villagers simultaneously dismisses your followers, and brings new ones to your side. As a result, you cant stack villagers by spamming the call. So try to use it when you're surrounded by a lot of them
  • spider mobs were modeled, animated, programmed and ready to kill BUT I FORGOT TO SPAWN THEM SO THERE'S ONLY ONE CHILLING IN THE WATER. There's a cannon in Suzanne's mouth ready to spit out a swarm of spiders :(
Description:

To fit the "share knowledge" theme, we came up with a pretty complex idea that we couldn't fully implement. The game was going to take place on an island during an apocalyptic event separated by stages. Each stage would be a different challenge such as meteor shower, flooding, radiation.

As the player, your first time through would be difficult since you don't know what to expect. If you manage to survive you are met with an unstoppable boss. You can then jump into a time portal and restart the apocalypse with everything you know.

Your goal is then to try and teach the villagers how to survive by leading them away from threats. If the villagers get to the end with you, they go back in time, are now smarter, and can fend for themselves and help others.

Eventually, you amass an army of villagers that can kill the final boss.
